name: Virtual Farm
description:
Attention! This version may not be compatible with iPhone 7!

Turn a struggling ranch into a booming success in Virtual Farm! Till your ground, plant your crops, water your fields, harvest your produce and take your goods to market in this fast-paced chartbuster. You'll have your hands full as you go from a few patches of hay to a farm packed with seven quick-growing crops!
The faster you work, the more money you'll earn! In addition to testing your time management skills, Virtual Farm will challenge you to employ basic economic strategy as you keep an eye on supply and demand and set your prices. Earn enough money and you'll be able to build processing plants that can turn your raw goods into exciting new products. With tons of upgrades, plenty of customers and simple finger-tapping controls, Virtual Farm will have your entire family shouting "YEE HAW!"
GAME FEATURES:
◇ Seven crops
◇ 11 buildings
◇ 19 products
◇ Buildings upgrades
◇ Dynamic market
◇ Game Center support (with leaderboards and achievements)

For more games, visit us at iphone.alawar.com!

FIND US in FACEBOOK: AlawarEntertainment
FOLLOW US in TWITTER: @AlawarMobile
